metadata.title: Smart Domain Generator
metadata.description: AI-driven project naming and domain suggestion system

home.title: Smart Domain Generator
home.subtitle: AI-driven project naming and domain suggestion system
home.placeholder: Example: I want to create a social app for pet owners to share photos and daily life

hero.subtitle: Simply describe your idea, and AI will intelligently generate project names and check domain availability in real-time. Simple, fast, intelligent.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Integrated with the latest AI technology, providing you with the smartest domain generation experience

aiAnalysis.title: AI Smart Analysis
aiAnalysis.content: Using advanced natural language processing technology to deeply understand your project needs, intelligently extract keywords and perform semantic expansion, generating domain suggestions that best match your ideas.

multiStrategy.title: Multi-Strategy Naming
multiStrategy.content: Using various professional naming strategies such as direct combination, concept fusion, and creating new words to ensure generated domains are both creative and memorable, perfectly matching your brand image.

realTimeQuery.title: Real-time Query
realTimeQuery.content: Batch real-time query domain availability, displaying detailed registration information and prices, one-click jump to purchase links, allowing you to quickly lock in your favorite domain.

smartFavorites.title: Smart Favorites
smartFavorites.content: Intelligently bookmark favorite domains, support tag classification and note management, and track domain status changes to ensure you don't miss any registration opportunities.

searchHistory.title: Search History
searchHistory.content: Completely save your search history and results, support re-viewing historical search results, allowing you to easily compare creative ideas from different periods.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.content: Using enterprise-level security standards to protect your search data and creative ideas, supporting data export, giving you complete control over your information.

stats.title: Trustworthy Data
stats.usersHelpedDefault: Helped millions of users find ideal domains

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Start using Smart Domain Generator now to find the perfect domain for your next project

apiKeys.title: API Key Management
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage your API access keys
apiKeys.noKeysDescription: Create your first API key to start using the API
apiKeys.usageDescription: Include the API key in your request headers to access our API
apiKeys.createDescription: Create a new API access key for your application
apiKeys.keyDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose of this key
apiKeys.newKeyDescription: Please copy and securely store your API key immediately. For security reasons, it will only be shown once.
apiKeys.newKeyWarning: This key will not be displayed again. If you lose it, you will need to generate a new one.
apiKeys.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
apiKeys.deleteDescription: After deletion, applications using this key will not be able to access the API. This action cannot be undone.
apiKeys.loadFailedDescription: Unable to load API key list
apiKeys.nameRequiredDescription: API key name cannot be empty
apiKeys.createSuccessDescription: Please save your API key securely, it will only be shown once
apiKeys.createFailedDescription: Unable to create API key, please try again
apiKeys.deleteFailedDescription: Unable to delete API key, please try again
apiKeys.copySuccessDescription: API key has been copied to clipboard
apiKeys.curlCopyDescription: Please replace YOUR_API_KEY with your actual key

usageInstructions.title: How to use API keys
usageInstructions.description: Include the API key in your request headers to access our API
usageInstructions.healthCheckFailedDesc: Unable to connect to API service

notes.apiKeyAuth: API keys are used to authenticate your application identity
notes.secureStorage: Do not expose your API keys in client-side code
notes.keyRotation: Regularly rotate your API keys to improve security
notes.rateLimits: Request limits for each key depend on your subscription plan

tips.twoFactor: Enable two-factor authentication in your Google account
tips.checkSessions: Regularly check current session information to confirm it's your activity
tips.signOutPublic: Sign out promptly after using unfamiliar devices
tips.noPublicDevices: Don't stay logged in on public devices
tips.checkActivity: Regularly check your Google account security activity logs
tips.changePassword: If you discover unusual login activity, immediately change your Google account password

sdk.title: SDK Support
sdk.description: We provide official SDKs for multiple programming languages to make integration even easier:

account.title: Account Information
items: Email address (for account registration and notifications)
Username (optional)
Avatar (if you choose to upload)

usage.title: Usage Data
items: Domain search history (to provide history feature)
Favorited domains (for favorites feature)
API usage statistics (for quota management)

technical.title: Technical Information
items: IP address (for security and abuse prevention)
Browser type and version
Device information
Access time and page view history

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process your requests and transactions
Send service-related notifications and updates
Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience
Protect service security and prevent fraud and abuse

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure

noSelling.title: We Do Not Sell Your Personal Information
noSelling.description: We promise to never sell your personal information to third parties.

dataSharing.sharingCases: We may share your information in the following cases:
cases: To protect our rights, property, or safety
With trusted service providers (such as hosting services)

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We take multiple security measures to protect your information:

encryption.title: Encrypted Transmission
encryption.description: Using HTTPS to encrypt all data transmission

audit.title: Regular Audits
audit.description: Regular security audits and vulnerability scanning

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

access.title: Access Rights
access.description: You can request access to a copy of your personal information we store

correction.title: Correction Rights
correction.description: You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information

deletion.title: Deletion Rights
deletion.description: You can request deletion of your personal information (except where required by law)

portability.title: Data Portability Rights
portability.description: You can request to receive your personal information in a machine-readable format

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or comments about our privacy policy, please contact us:
contact.alternative: Or submit a request through the website's help center

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.description: Please read these terms of service carefully. By using Smart Domain, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

freeUse.title: Free to Use
freeUse.description: Basic features are permanently free, paid features are optional

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: Your data belongs to you, we are responsible for protecting it

fairUse.title: Fair Use
fairUse.description: Reasonable use, no abuse or malicious behavior

userResponsibility.title: User Responsibility
userResponsibility.description: Comply with laws and respect intellectual property rights

serviceDescription.title: 1. Service Description
serviceDescription.description: Smart Domain (the "Service") is an intelligent domain generation and suggestion platform designed to help users find suitable domain names for their projects, businesses, or personal brands.
serviceDescription.includes: Our services include but are not limited to:

accountRegistration.title: 2.1 Account Registration
items: You must provide accurate and complete registration information
You are responsible for maintaining account security and password confidentiality
One person or entity can only register one account
You must be at least 13 years old to use this service

acceptableUse.title: 2.2 Acceptable Use
items: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Infringe on others' intellectual property or other rights
Spread malware or harmful code
Conduct automated attacks or abuse the service
Attempt to bypass usage restrictions or security measures
Resell or distribute the service without authorization

yourContent.title: Your Content
yourContent.description: You retain all rights to content you create. By using our service, you grant us the necessary licenses to operate the service.

ourContent.title: Our Content
ourContent.description: Smart Domain's software, design, text, graphics, and other content are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

domainSuggestions.title: Domain Suggestions
domainSuggestions.description: Domain suggestions we generate do not constitute trademark or copyright claims. Users are responsible for ensuring selected domains do not infringe on others' rights.

subscription.title: 4.1 Subscription and Billing
items: Paid subscriptions are billed monthly or annually
Prices may change but will not affect existing subscription periods
Auto-renewal can be canceled at any time

refundPolicy.title: 4.2 Refund Policy
refundPolicy.description: New subscribers can request a full refund within 7 days of purchase without providing a reason.

asIs.title: Service Provided "As Is":
asIs.description: We strive to provide reliable service but cannot guarantee the service will always be available or error-free.

domainAvailability.title: Domain Availability:
domainAvailability.description: Domain availability information is for reference only and may change at the time of actual registration.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability:
liability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Smart Domain is not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.

privacyAndData.title: 6. Privacy and Data Protection
privacyAndData.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacyAndData.commitment: We are committed to protecting your data security and will not sell your personal information.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.userTermination: You may stop using our service and delete your account at any time.
termination.ourRights: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account in the following cases:
reasons: Violation of these terms of service
Engaging in fraudulent or illegal activities
Abusing the service or causing harm to other users

modifications.title: 8. Modifications to Terms
modifications.description: We may update these terms from time to time. For significant changes, we will notify you via email or in-service notification. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the modified terms.

contactInfo.title: 9. Contact Us
contactInfo.description: If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us:
contactInfo.address: Address: Pudong New Area, Shanghai, China
